option.custom_fishing_lines.enabled.tool: Sets whether or not the mod is enabled
option.custom_fishing_lines.pattern.tool: Sets the specific pattern that's being used
option.custom_fishing_lines.percentage_b: Sets the bias given to the percentages of the pattern
option.custom_fishing_lines.segment_coun:
Overrides the segment count of the fishing rod's rendering
-1 disables this
